18.text:
Everything has lost its meaning. If this all
ended tomorrow, you wouldn't care.

23.text: Sign Two: Pressure In The Head

It feels as if you have a cat sitting on your
head. It makes you want to curl up and sleep.

64.text:

74.text:

It's like the universe has got a personal

103.text: You can't put this dark place into words.
